name: Project Level
description: Project Level's mission is to educate, inspire, and motivate the at-risk and underserved youth in our communities through the arts. While providing a safe environment for our youth to freely express themselves and nurture their talents, we aim to offer opportunities for them to turn their skills into a job that will create a better life for the youth and their families.
fullDescription: Project Level's mission is to educate, inspire, and motivate the at-risk and underserved youth in our communities through the arts. While providing a safe environment for our youth to freely express themselves and nurture their talents, we aim to offer opportunities for them to turn their skills into a job that will create a better life for the youth and their families.
